title: Be Careful What You Copy
description: Don’t take your cues from culture. In “Be Careful What You Copy,” Pastor Steven Furtick of Elevation Church reveals that, when we copy culture, we’re missing out on the unique plans God has for us.
dc:creator: Elevation Church
itunes:summary: Don’t take your cues from culture. In “Be Careful What You Copy,” Pastor Steven Furtick of Elevation Church reveals that, when we copy culture, we’re missing out on the unique plans God has for us.
